name: Signature-King-Room-Park-View-Signature-King-Room-Park-View
caption: Signature King Room Park View
description: Sweeping views of Central Park and the Upper East Side make a stay in our Signature Rooms simply unforgettable.
alt:
The Signature King room has majestic views of Central Park and Upper East Side.  The room has an entry foyer and 2 double doors closets. The bedroom designed with a soft color palette and contains a plush king sized bed flanked by two night stands, Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. An executive writing desk and chair is located opposite the bed and a 40‚Äù TV on a console is across the bed with mini bar. Two comfortable armchairs with side table is also featured in the room. 

The four fixture Turkish clad marble bathroom features a pedestal sink, glass enclosed shower, bathtub, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro amenities.
